name: extract-code-blocks
description: Extract code blocks (``` delimited) from markdown text at a specified path

input.description: Any JSON object containing a string value at the specified path

path.description: Dot-separated path to the string field containing markdown (e.g., 'data.content')

output.description: Array of code block strings (including ``` delimiters), or empty array if path doesn't exist, value is not a string, or no code blocks found

examples.description: No code blocks returns empty array
